TemplateConfiguration._Description: Creates an ASP.NET Web Form that is the child of a Master Page, with a CodeBehind class.

AspNetMasterContentFile.name: ${Name}.aspx
AspNetMasterContentFile.FileText:
<%@ Page Language="${AspNetLanguage}" Inherits="${Namespace}.${Name}" MasterPageFile="${AspNetMaster}" %>
<%@ MasterType VirtualPath="${AspNetMaster}" %>
${AspNetMasterContent}
